sqlMap.select: SELECT rqst_date, (SELECT rspofc_nm FROM t_security_user WHERE srvno = t_security_rqst_ugcy.rqstr_srvno) AS rqstr_srvno, (SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code WHERE cd = t_security_rqst_ugcy.incdt_actvt_type_cd) AS incdt_actvt_type_cd, actvt_date, ctlg_cd, ctlg_itm_cd, rsn, (SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code WHERE cd = t_security_rqst_ugcy.state_cd) AS state_cd, seq, opn FROM t_security_rqst_ugcy WHERE 1=1 and rqstr_srvno IN (SELECT srvno FROM t_security_user WHERE Incdt_idtf_cd = #searchCode#) order by rqst_date desc

SELECT rqst_date, (SELECT rspofc_nm FROM t_security_user WHERE srvno = t_security_rqst_ugcy.rqstr_srvno) AS rqstr_srvno, (SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code WHERE cd = t_security_rqst_ugcy.incdt_actvt_type_cd) AS incdt_actvt_type_cd, actvt_date, (SELECT ctlg_nm FROM t_security_ctlg_cd WHERE ctlg_cd = t_security_rqst_ugcy.ctlg_cd) AS ctlg_cd, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg WHERE ctlg_itm_cd = t_security_rqst_ugcy.ctlg_itm_cd) AS ctlg_itm_cd, rsn, (SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code WHERE cd = t_security_rqst_ugcy.state_cd) AS state_cd, seq, opn FROM t_security_rqst_ugcy WHERE seq = #seq# order by rqst_date desc

SELECT rqst_date, (SELECT rspofc_nm FROM t_security_user WHERE srvno = t_security_rqst_ugcy.rqstr_srvno) AS rqstr_srvno, (SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code WHERE cd = t_security_rqst_ugcy.incdt_actvt_type_cd) AS incdt_actvt_type_cd, actvt_date, ctlg_cd, ctlg_itm_cd, rsn, (SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code WHERE cd = t_security_rqst_ugcy.state_cd) AS state_cd, seq, opn FROM t_security_rqst_ugcy WHERE seq = #seq#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE T_SECURITY_RQST_UGCY SET state_cd = (SELECT cd FROM t_security_code WHERE cd_nm = #state_cd#), opn = #opn# where seq = #seq#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO t_security_rqst_ugcy ( incdt_idtf_cd, rqst_date, rqstr_srvno, incdt_actvt_type_cd, actvt_date, ctlg_cd, ctlg_itm_cd, rsn, state_cd, opn, seq, id ) VALUES ( #incdt_idtf_cd#, SYSDATE, #rqstr_srvno#, #incdt_actvt_type_cd#, #actvt_date#, #ctlg_cd#, #ctlg_itm_cd#, #rsn#, #state_cd#, NULL, (SELECT NVL(MAX(seq), 0) FROM t_security_rqst_ugcy)+1, #id#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT *, (SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code WHERE cd=incdt_actvt_type_cd) AS incdt_actvt_type_cd_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg WHERE ctlg_itm_cd=A.ctlg_itm_cd) AS ctlg_itm_nm, (SELECT rspofc_nm FROM t_security_user WHERE srvno=rqstr_srvno) AS rqstr_nm, (SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code A, t_security_user B WHERE B.srvno=rqstr_srvno AND A.cd=B.rnkcd) AS rqstr_rnk FROM t_security_rqst_ugcy A WHERE incdt_idtf_cd = #incdt_idtf_cd# AND state_cd = 'D1' ORDER BY rqst_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM t_security_rqst_ugcy WHERE id = #id# AND rqstr_srvno = #rqstr_srvno# AND ctlg_itm_cd = #ctlg_itm_cd#

select (SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code WHERE cd = incdt_idtf_cd) AS incdt_idtf_cd, rqst_date, (SELECT rspofc_nm FROM t_security_user WHERE srvno = rqstr_srvno) AS rqstr_srvno, (SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code WHERE cd = incdt_actvt_type_cd) AS incdt_actvt_type_cd, actvt_date, (SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code WHERE cd = ctlg_cd) AS ctlg_cd, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg a WHERE a.ctlg_itm_cd = b.ctlg_itm_cd) AS ctlg_itm_cd, rsn, (SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code WHERE cd = state_cd) AS state_cd, opn, seq, task_cd, id from t_security_rqst_ugcy b where 1 = 1 and incdt_idtf_cd = #incdt_idtf_cd#
actvt_date = #actvt_date#
rqst_date = #rqst_date#
rqstr_srvno in (select srvno from t_security_user where rspofc_nm like '%' || #rqstr_nm# || '%')
incdt_actvt_type_cd in (select cd from t_security_code where cd_nm like '%' || #incdt_actvt_type_cd# || '%' and cd like 'F%')
